quoteText: Users' Personal Information may be maintained, processed and stored by ISODME and our authorized affiliates and service providers in in-house servers in our Massachusetts server room in the United States, data hosted with Microsoft’s Azure Cloud, data hosted with Google Drive and other Google cloud services, data hosted with Amazon Web Services, or with our in-house computers in our server room near Shanghai, China.
title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: "Users' Personal Information may be maintained, processed and stored by ISODME and our authorized affiliates and service providers in in-house servers in our Massachusetts server room in the United States, data hosted with Microsoft’s Azure Cloud, data hosted with Google Drive and other Google cloud services, data hosted with Amazon Web Services, or with our in-house computers in our server room near Shanghai, China."
